channel.title: [pi] quick way to change price list [pi]
channel.description: Is there any quick way to make every price on prices 1gp each?

item.title: [pi] quick way to change price list [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

99matt99:

Is there any quick way to make every price on prices 1gp each?

I just re-read your question. Do you want to change every price to 1gp, or every price that is 1gp to something else?

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] quick way to change price list [pi]
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

i just removed everything into another document incase cause alot of items i need to lower but it lowered prices pretty dramatically. But ty anyways might try it later =p

item.source: [pi] quick way to change price list [pi]

item.title: [pi] quick way to change price list [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

The quickest way I could think of doing it is use your mouse to highlight what you need and have the number copied to your clipboard and just use Ctrl + V. You’ll be able to build up a momentum once you get used to the process.

If there’s alot of the same number then do Ctrl + F and replace them one by one (don’t ever do replace all incase it changes something you don’t want changing).

Not much else I can suggest really.

Read full topic
